module.p: a dh’aindeoin despite, in spite of, notwithstanding, nevertheless is a prepositional compound, introducing an adverbial of contrast.

Examples –
A dh’aindeoin an teas chùm [am ministear] air a choilear geal is aodach dubh.
Despite the heat, [the minister] kept on his white collar and black suit. td. 12
Dh’fheumadh na h-iasgairean a h-uile càil a bha dhìth orra a cheannach anns a’ bhùth aige. Ach a dh’aindeoin sin bha an sgioba riaraichte, oir bha gach fear a’ faireachdainn gu robh e ag obair air a cheann fhèin, gu robh e neo-eisimeileach.
The fishermen had to buy everything they needed from his shop. But in spite of that the crew were satisfied, because each man felt that he was working for himself, that he was independent. td. 88
